works.description:
This is a digital image of an original  
watercolor painting called "Music Gives you Wings" - that I have a legal &  
binding certificate of copyright for, from the Library of Congress.

I painted this image, and have not given this user the right to use it on  
their site ESPECIALLY for the fact that they not only edited my image  
(horribly) but did not provide attribution to it, or a link back to my  
work, anywhere on their blog post found at
